description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Burgers With Quick Pickle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken burger,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Mince,Quick & easy lunch,Chicken
name: Chicken Burgers With Quick Pickle Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Shave cucumber and carrot into long, thin ribbons using a vegetable peeler. Place into a bowl. Whisk vinegar, sugar and 1 tsp salt in a bowl until dissolved. Pour over vegetables and stand for 10-15 minutes. Drain.
Meanwhile, combine chicken, spring onion, garlic, lime rind and sauces in a bowl. Mix well together using your hands. Form into 4 patties.
Heat a heavy-based frying pan over medium heat. Brush patties with oil and cook for 3-4 minutes each side or until cooked through.
Combine mayonnaise with 1 tbs lime juice. Spread on bun bases, top with patties, pea shoots and pickle and finish with bun tops.
